The Lord of the Rings : The Fellowship of the Ring
A fantastic and unique land called Middle-earth , a hobbit ( beings height between 80 cm and 1.20 m , with hairy legs and cheeks slightly reddened ) receives a gift from his uncle the One Ring , a magic ring and malignant that needs to be destroyed before it falls into the hands of evil . For this the hobbit Frodo (Elijah Woods ) will have a hard road ahead , where you can find danger, fear and bizarre characters . By his side to accomplish this journey slowly it may rely on other hobbits , an elf , a dwarf , two humans and a mage , totaling 9 people that form the Fellowship of the Ring .

The Lord of the Rings : The Two Towers
After the capture of Merry ( Dominic Monaghan ) and Pippy ( Billy Boyd ) by orcs , the Fellowship of the Ring is dissolved . While Frodo (Elijah Wood) and Sam ( Sean Astin ) continue towards their journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring , Aragorn ( Viggo Mortensen ) , Legolas ( Orlando Bloom) and Gimli ( John Rhys - Davies ) run to rescue abducted hobbits .

The Lord of the Rings : The Return Of The King
Sauron is planning a major attack on Minas Tirith , capital of Gondor , which makes Gandalf ( Ian McKellen ) and Pippin ( Billy Boyd ) leave for the site with the intention of helping the resistance . An army is assembled by Theoden ( Bernard Hill ) in Rohan , in another attempt to stop the forces of Sauron . Meanwhile Frodo (Elijah Wood) , Sam ( Sean Astin ) , and Gollum ( Andy Serkins ) follow their journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring .
